contest-event.event-date:
April 27, 1986 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section B)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section B) 20 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-section-b
Civic Hall, Holmfirth Prizes - 1st £70 and shield, 2nd £40 and cup, 3rd £30, 4th £20. March contest - 1st(£15 and cup) Hinchliffe Mill, 2nd(£10) Marsden. Hymn tune contest - 1st(£15 and cup) Marsden, 2nd(£10) Linthwaite. 60th annual contest. 8 bands competed.
April 6, 2012, 8:36 a.m. June 27, 2016, 10:09 p.m.
1 Uppermill Band Harold Robinson Petite Suite de Ballet
2 Linthwaite Silver Band John Iredale Vizcaya
3 Hinchliffe Mill Band R. Broadhead First Suite in Eb [arr. Herbert]
4 Marsden Silver Prize Band Tony Jaeger-Fozard Suite Gothique
Unknown Result Shepley Steve Platten Promenade
Unknown Result Honley Silver Band John Sheard Indian Summer
Unknown Result Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Jack Fisher Lorenzo
Unknown Result Slaithwaite Band Gerald Frost Othello
Withdrawn Scapegoat Hill Unknown
